mapper.select: SELECT b.item_code, b.item_qty, i.sale_price, i.price FROM TB_BASKET b JOIN TB_ITEM i ON i.item_code = b.item_code WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDER (order_no, user_id, order_date) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{orderDate})
INSERT INTO TB_ORDERDETAIL (order_no, ORDERDETAIL_NO, item_code, item_qty, item_price) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{orderDetailNo}, #{itemCode}, #{itemQty}, #{itemPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT sum(item_qty * item_price) FROM TB_ORDERDETAIL WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
